entities.name: fred
entities.description: Fred is mentioned as one of Harry's friends who overheard his parents talking on the Extendable Ears.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is mentioned as the main character who is asking questions and reacting to the news about Ron being a prefect.

entities.name: george
entities.description: George is mentioned as one of Harry's friends who comments on the situation with the previous prefects.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is mentioned as receiving a letter from Hogwarts and being chosen as a prefect.

entities.name: weasley_mum
entities.description: Weasley Mum is mentioned as talking to Weasley Dad on the Extendable Ears.

entities.name: weasley_dad
entities.description: Weasley Dad is mentioned as talking to Weasley Mum on the Extendable Ears.

relationships.description: Fred and Harry are friends who overheard their parents talking.
George and Harry are friends who comment on the situation with the previous prefects.
Ron and Harry are friends who react to Ron's news about being a prefect.
Weasley Mum and Weasley Dad are married and talking on the Extendable Ears.
